page.title: 15Playground Games (1)
page.content: The older boys(eight and nine)generally play football in the playground.Even he young ones,although not encouraged to join in,play with a football on their own.Many girls,particularly in the warmer weather,practice handstands, cartwheels and play leapfrog. From time to time the boys not interested in football play imaginative games based on T.V.films they have seen.Currently popular is 'Jason and the Argonauts'and 'Star Wars'.These both involve being 'rescued' from difficult situations.Another game frequently played is 'Dracula Round the Sheds'.Both boys and girls join in this game.Someone is chosen as Dracula and they stand between two sheds used for storing P.E. apparatus. The rest of the children follow each other round the sheds in a large ring.....(continued on Page 16).
